title: Beanie Feldstein | Greene, Gosar and Brooks Face Growing Scrutiny for Jan. 6 Insurrection: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at GOP members of Congress facing growing scrutiny over their roles in the attempt to overthrow democracy on January 6 after a bombshell report linked them to the organizers.

Then, Beanie Feldstein talks about reviving Barbra Streisand’s role as Fanny Brice in the musical Funny Girl, her brother Jonah Hill tattooing her name on his arm and playing Monica Lewinsky in Impeachment: American Crime Story. 

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
